titleStmt.title: An exposition vpon the Epistle to the Colossians Wherein, not onely the text is methodically analysed, and the sence of the words, by the help of writers, both ancient and moderne is explayned: but also, by doctrine and vse, the intent of the holy Ghost is in euery place more fully vnfolded and vrged. ... Being, the substance of neare seuen yeeres weeke-dayes sermons, of N. Byfield, late one of the preachers for the citie of Chester.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[dward] G[riffin] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sould at his shop at the signe of the Pide-Bull in Pauls Church-yard, neare to S. Austins Gate,

notesStmt.note: Chapters 2 and 3 begin new pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
